taskbody.context: This procedure starts a ZooKeeper ensemble.

The window of time for starting a ZooKeeper ensemble is relatively short. The goal of this procedure is to restart on each ensemble node at about the same time, so that each node can participate in electing the leader.

step.cmd: Log in to the master host .
In a separate window, log in to the second node of the ZooKeeper ensemble (Pool-Host-A-IP).
In another separate window, log in to the third node of the ZooKeeper ensemble (Pool-Host-B-IP).
On all ensemble hosts, stop and start serviced.

stepxmp.codeblock: systemctl stop serviced && systemctl start serviced

step.cmd: On the master host, check the status of the ZooKeeper ensemble.

stepxmp.codeblock: { echo stats; sleep 1; } | nc localhost 2181 | grep Mode { echo stats; sleep 1; } | nc Pool-Host-A-IP 2181 | grep Mode { echo stats; sleep 1; } | nc Pool-Host-B-IP 2181 | grep Mode

step.info: If nc is not available, you can use telnet with interactive ZooKeeper commands.

step.cmd: Log in to the browser interface, and then start and related applications, if desired.
